Package org.bongz.listeners

Class ListenerClass

java.lang.Object
org.bongz.listeners.ListenerClass
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.testng.ISuiteListener, org.testng.ITestListener, org.testng.ITestNGListener
public class ListenerClass extends Object implements org.testng.ITestListener, org.testng.ISuiteListener
Implements ITestListener and ISuiteListener to leverage the abstract methods Mostly used to help in extent report generation 
Please make sure to add the listener details in the testng.xml file
Mar 7, 2022
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bongani Maseko
